performance.title: Performance.
performance.description: ftp.io.kr delivers <0>4 Gbps</0> of stable egress bandwidth with no limits on parallel connections.

reliable.title: Reliable.
reliable.description: ftp.io.kr is designed for <0>99.99%</0> monthly availability and delivers <1>zero-downtime</1> rolling updates through Kubernetes deployment strategies.

anonymous.title: Anonymous.
anonymous.description: ftp.io.kr <0>does not</0> collect any tracking data, cookies, or <1>IP addresses</1><2>[1]</2>. Privacy-conscious users can verify this directly in the nginx configuration.

transparent.title: Transparent.
transparent.description: ftp.io.kr's source code is <0>publicly available</0>, including all Kubernetes manifests, nginx configurations, indexer source code, and supporting shell scripts.

shortUrl.title: And... Short URL.
shortUrl.description: <0>ftp.io.kr</0> is short by design. With only Arch Linux packages hosted, access requires no path prefix.
